scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && CI=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && npm run migrate
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
